name: highwayhasher
description: HighwayHash implementation for both node and browsers

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build:web && npm run build:web-simd && npm run build:native && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build:web-simd: RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+simd128' wasm-pack build -t web --out-dir ../src/web-simd web
scripts.optimize: wasm-opt -Os src/web/highwayhasher_web_bg.wasm -o tmp.wasm && mv tmp.wasm src/web/highwayhasher_web_bg.wasm && wasm-opt -Os src/web-simd/highwayhasher_web_bg.wasm -o tmp.wasm && mv tmp.wasm src/web-simd/highwayhasher_web_bg.wasm
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:inplace
scripts.test:inplace: npm run test:native && npm run test:types
scripts.prepublishOnly: ./assets/download-releases.sh && npm test && npm run optimize && npm run build:bundle

author: Nick Babcock <nbabcock19@hotmail.com>
